meaningMnemonic: <radical>Run</radical> into <radical>oneself</radical> in a dream and you'll definitely <kanji>wake up</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: If one runs into oneself and you don't <kanji>wake up</kanji>, just look down at your waist. If you're wearing an <reading>o</reading>bi (お) you know it's a dream and you'll eventually wake up. If you aren't wearing an obi then it isn't a dream and you don't have anything to wake up from.
